events.name: Rest Day
events.description:
Rest day, no workout.
(Ref: FTP 314 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: High-Intensity Intervals (INDOOR)
events.description:
Warmup, 5x30s sprints, Z2 recovery, cooldown. Focus on power output.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Recovery Spin (INDOOR)
events.description:
Easy spin, low cadence, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Tempo Intervals (INDOOR)
events.description:
Warmup, 3x10min tempo, low cadence, Z2 recovery, cooldown.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Recovery Spin (INDOOR)
events.description:
Easy spin, low cadence, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Long Endurance Ride (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
2-3h Z2 ride, focus on endurance. Hydrate well.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: Threshold Focus (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
90 min threshold intervals, focus on power output.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)
